General_Description: '''Precious Jewels''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Traveling with expensive jewelry made [[Courtesan|''hetaerae'']] desirable and thus could earn them profit, but it also opened them to attacks from [[Thief|thieves]].
